Title: Improving Angular CI Build Time Using Azure DevOps Cache task
Description: This article will discuss about improving Angular CI build time using Azure DevOps Cache task. If you‚Äôre building Angular applications with Azure DevOps, you will be running npm install command every time even if you‚Äôre not changed anything in the package.json. It is a time consuming process. Azure Devops offers a Cache task, which will help you to cache downloaded libraries or tools your build pipeline. In this example, I am using a minimal angular application, which is added to Azure Repo - you can use GitHub or any other source control supported by Azure DevOps. And then I created a build pipeline for the Angular application.

Title: Public domain compositions exist : Blog : DBM
Description: Since YouTube is the dominant video platform, a lot has already been said about its copyright claims system. Most of that has had to do with questions about what constitutes fair use (in movie reviews, for instance). Google‚Äôs AI is mostly trained to recognize the presence or non-presence of content in your video, not whether or not your use is fair (something that varies between jurisdictions, by the way).
